title: 265：嗅觉到底有多重要？
intro:
嗅觉和记忆的关系是什么？有哪些疾病和气味相关？人的体味的背后又隐藏着怎样的信息？失去嗅觉会是一种怎样的体验？希望能通过这期节目，让你重新审视你的嗅觉。 


  


 
 
 Reference
 
 
 Harvey, P. (2006). Anosmia. Practical Neurology, 6(1), 65-65.
 
 
 Herz, R. (2016). The role of odor-evoked memory in psychological and physiological health. Brain sciences, 6(3), 22.
 
 
 Waguespack, R. W. (1992). "Congenital Anosmia". Archives of Otolaryngology–Head & Neck Surgery. 118 (1): 10. 
 
 
 Jafek, B. W., Gordon, A. S., Moran, D. T., & Eller, P. M. (1990). Congenital anosmia. Ear, nose, & throat journal, 69(5), 331-337.
 
 
 Leopold, D. A., Hornung, D. E., & Schwob, J. E. (1992). Congenital Lack of Olfactory Ability. Annals of Otology, Rhinology & Laryngology, 101(3), 229–236.
 
 
 Kalat, J. W. (2016). Biological psychology (12e.). Boston, MA: Cengage Learning.
 
 
 顾凡及《脑科学的新故事》
